official_title: To repeal the Act entitled " An Act to designate the building located at 1515 Sam Houston Street in Liberty, Texas, as the 'M.P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Senior, Post Office Building'", approved May 17, 1990.

summary.text: Repeals the Act designating the building located at 1515 Sam Houston Street, Liberty, Texas, as the M.P. Daniel and Thomas F. Calhoon, Senior, Post Office Building.
